cons: Avoid taking roasted chicory or drinking chicory tea during pregnancy.
Celery is one of the foods that contains the most residual pesticides.
Celery may cause an allergic reaction whether it is cooked or raw, and if you are concerned about a potential allergy, speak with a medical professional to get tested.
description: It helps to maintain cholesterol levels.
It helps to prevent or treat high blood pressure.

Celery useful for treating a wide range of conditions that are made worse by inflammation such as joint pain  gout, kidney and liver infections, skin disorders, irritable bowel syndrome and urinary tract infections.
